name: A Simple Request for Cat Food Gets Way Out of Hand
name_original: A Simple Request for Cat Food Gets Way Out of Hand
description:
Your cat is begging to be fed, but you're out of cat food. To make matters worse, the store is out of stock! Go on unexpected and needlessly convoluted quest to feed your cat. Made in RPG Maker using stock assets as a practice project.

Keyboard and mouse controls:

  • Movement: Arrow keys, NUM pad or click destination
  • Action: Z, SPACE, ENTER or click target
  • Cancel: X, Esc, Num pad 0 or right click
  • Menu: X, Esc, Num pad 0 or right click

Gamepad controls:

  • Movement: Left analog stick or D-pad
  • Action: A
  • Cancel: B
  • Menu: Y
